gsw_content_information.article:
A Genius Result configuration displays the best answer for a search query as an actionable Genius Result card that appears first in the search results. Link the default Catalog Item, People, and Q&A Genius Result configurations to your own search profiles.
  1. Review the existing Genius Results configurations for the default search profile by following these steps.
    1. Edit the search profile.
    2. In the Genius Results related list, edit the Genius Results configuration.
    3. Examine the settings on the AI Search Genius Result Configuration form.
    4. Return to the search profile by clicking the Back icon.
  2. Optionally, link one or more of the default Genius Results configurations to your search profiles by following these steps.
    1. Edit the search profile that you want to link a Genius Results configuration to.
    2. In the Genius Results related list, click Link Existing.
    3. On the Search Profile - Genius Result Mapping form, fill in the fields.
      Genius Result Configuration
      Use the lookup icon to select one of the default Genius Result Configurations.
      Order
      Numeric evaluation order for the Genius Results configuration. AI Search evaluates Genius Results configurations with lower order values first.
    4. Click Submit.
    5. To make the updated search profile settings take effect, click Publish.
gsw_content_information.title: Configure Genius Results
